Class ProjectsViewFilters

Object
ProjectsViewFilters
public class ProjectsViewFilters extends Object
Project view filters. Filters are composited into a single object to simplify. They are all treated as an AND filters. See ProjectsView

    • getFilterAvailableProjectTypes

      public Set<BTOProjectTypeID> getFilterAvailableProjectTypes()
      Exclude project types getter. Empty implies that there is no need to filter. If there are multiple, it means that the project will be shown AS LONG AS AT LEAST 1 project type filtered is available for booking.
      Returns:
      filterAvailableProjectTypes

    • setFilterAvailableProjectTypes

      public void setFilterAvailableProjectTypes(Set<BTOProjectTypeID> filterAvailableProjectTypes)
      Only include projects with available slots for project type, setter.
      Parameters:
      filterAvailableProjectTypes - project types

    • canFilterProject

      public boolean canFilterProject(BTOProject project, User user)
      Checks if a project, given the user filtering, can pass.
      Parameters:
      project - the project being filtered.
      user - the user filtering.
      Returns:
      true if project passes the filters.

    • applyFilters

      public List<BTOProject> applyFilters(List<BTOProject> projects, User user)
      Applies the filters INCLUDING SORTING, to a list of projects, given the user.
      Parameters:
      projects - the list of projects.
      user - the user doing the filtering.
      Returns:
      a list of projects filtered and sorted.
